languages.text: "Я бы предпочел больше не доводить проблему до показательной экзекуции. Лучше, когда не страх, а верность интересам династии руководит дворянством".

traits.locale_text: "Я бы предпочел больше не доводить проблему до показательной экзекуции. Лучше, когда не страх, а верность интересам династии руководит дворянством".

languages.text: "I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."
languages.original_text: "Я бы предпочел больше не доводить проблему до показательной экзекуции. Лучше, когда не страх, а верность интересам династии руководит дворянством".

traits.locale_text: "I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."
"I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."
"I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."
"I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."
"I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."
"I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."

languages.text: «Preferiría no recurrir a la ejecución pública como solución para todos los problemas. Es mejor que sea la fidelidad a la dinastía, y no el miedo, lo que gobierne a la nobleza».
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."

languages.text: 「あらゆる問題の解決手段として、公開処刑にばかり頼らないほうがよろしいでしょう。貴族は恐怖ではなく、王朝の利益への忠節の刃で統治される方がいいのです」
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."

languages.text: “我不太喜欢将公开处刑作为解决问题的手段。我更希望所有贵族都能忠于王朝的利益，而非生活在恐惧之中。”
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."

languages.text: "Ich würde es begrüßen, nicht jedes Problem mit öffentlichen Hinrichtungen zu lösen. Es wäre besser, der Adel würde durch Treue gegenüber den Interessen der Dynastie gelenkt, nicht durch Angst."
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."

languages.text: « Je préférerais éviter de recourir à une exécution publique pour résoudre le moindre de nos petits problèmes. Il vaut mieux inciter la noblesse à servir les intérêts de la dynastie par loyauté, plutôt que par crainte. »
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."
"I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."

languages.text: "Her sorunun çözümünde halk önünde infaza bel bağlamamayı yeğlerim. Soyluların korkudan ziyade hanedanlığın menfaatine vefayla hareket etmeleri daha iyidir."
languages.original_text: "I would prefer not to rely on public execution as a means to solving every problem. Better that the nobility be governed by fidelity to the dynasty's interests, rather than fear."
